title: Stock Futures Waver on Final Day of Tumultuous Month
sub_head: S&P 500 on course for its worst monthly performance since March 2020
body:
U.S. stock futures crept higher Monday, but major indexes are poised to close January with heavy losses following a month of volatile trading due to expected interest-rate increases.
Futures for the S&P 500 ticked up 0.2%. Stock indexes rallied Friday to finish one of their most tumultuous weeks on a high note. Contracts for the Nasdaq-100 added 0.7% Monday and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average were up 0.1%.
